description: Contains the adjudication information for each service line in a member estimate.

columns.name: ESTIMATE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the patient estimate record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ADDL_LINE_NUM
columns.description: The line number of related group 1000 that stores additional information about the charge line. It is used to map a line in 2000 related group to a procedure line.

columns.name: FILE_ORD_NUM
columns.description: The coverage level associated with the corresponding coverage (I PES 168).

columns.name: REMIT_CODE_ID
columns.description: This stores any Explanation of Benefits/Remittance Advice codes associated with the service line.

columns.name: REMIT_CODE_ID_REMIT_CODE_NAME
columns.description: The name of each remittance code.

columns.name: REMIT_AMT
columns.description: This stores the amount associated with the Explanation of Benefits or remittance advice codes.

columns.name: REMIT_CATEGORY_C_NAME
columns.description:
This stores the payment category that the payer has assigned the amount to


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Patient


Not Allowed


Other Adjustment


Denied
